string-array.name: tweet_text
string-array.item: Make an impact - a positive impact to our customers' success, our team & in our communities - #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
Servant leadership - Leadership at DVT is more coaching, than telling people what to do. #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
Safe to fail – quick to grow and learn. Sometimes we mess up, but we learn fast. We value learning. #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
Work-life balance - Life is about balance. At DVT we work hard so that we have time for fun. #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
Own it – do it. We stick to our word and get work done. #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
Do the right thing. Honesty, respect & integrity towards our colleagues is the right thing to do. #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
Simplicity - The art of achieving maximum results with minimum effort. We work hard and like to achieve a lot. #DVTRefresh @DVT_Corporate
